Summary: I was about 5 years old I saw a UFO in Bayou La Ba
trends: There have been no other sightings in Bayou La Batre
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details 1.I was playing paper dolls on the back porch thetop half of the porch was screen.The light had blown out so I was sitting in thearea were the kitchen light was shining so I could see. 2. The whole porch gotbright I turned to the light and it was right there. 3. I didnt know what itwas never saw one. 4.I was excited I called to my Granny come see the prettylights thats when she got upset and then I was afraid. 5.It was a saucer typewith lights that spin or appear to spin. 6.I thought it was going to land Iscreamed and thats all I remember it just disappeared I was outside at thistime. we left the house and ran the street with others. Please call me ThankYou, Dina Bowen
